channel.title: haproxy on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in haproxy on Morgoth

item.title: HAProxy
item.description: HAProxy https://www.haproxy.com/ 安装: $ sudo apt-get install haproxy 配置: $ sudo vim /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg global: mode: http | tcp | health defaults: frontend: backend: listen:
